content.text: I'm doing alright, thanks for asking! I'm trying to work on finding a new job and it's a bit stressful, but I'm hopeful! How are you doing?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! I'm a bit tired but that's because I stayed up late last night watching a movie.
Oh, what movie did you watch?
I watched "The Princess Bride", it's a classic!
I love that movie! I used to watch it all the time when I was a kid.
It's so good! I'm glad you like it.
I'm trying to get my roommate to watch it with me, but he's not a big fan of older movies.
Aw, that's too bad. It's a really good movie, I think he'd like it if he gave it a chance.
I'll keep trying to convince him!
